properties.areaDesc: Daviess, KY; Vanderburgh, IN; Henderson, KY; Posey, IN; Warrick, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 11:16AM CST until February 22 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Kentucky...Illinois...

Ohio River at Owensboro...Newburgh Dam...Evansville...Mount Vernon...
J.T. Myers Dam...Shawneetown and Golconda

.The Ohio River basin from Owensboro down to Golconda continue to rise.
All 7 of these points are expected to crest in the minor flood category
on Wednesday or Thursday of next week. The only exception is Shawneetown
which is forecast to just reach the moderate flood category on Tuesday.
They will start to fall slowly late in the week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Evansville.
* from Sunday afternoon to Saturday February 22.
* At 10:00 AM Saturday the stage was 41.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 42.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 42.8 feet by early Thursday morning. The
river will fall below flood stage by next Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 42.0 Feet...The river is 3300 feet wide.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
